<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeBillboard"></a>

# VisualShaderNodeBillboard

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNode](class_visualshadernode.md) **<** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

A node that controls how the object faces the camera to be used within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

The output port of this node needs to be connected to ``Model View Matrix`` port of [VisualShaderNodeOutput](class_visualshadernodeoutput.md).

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeBillboard_constant_BILLBOARD_TYPE_DISABLED"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[BillboardType](class_visualshadernodebillboard.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeBillboard_BillboardType) **BILLBOARD_TYPE_DISABLED** = `0`

Billboarding is disabled and the node does nothing.<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeBillboard_constant_BILLBOARD_TYPE_ENABLED"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[BillboardType](class_visualshadernodebillboard.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeBillboard_BillboardType) **BILLBOARD_TYPE_ENABLED** = `1`

A standard billboarding algorithm is enabled.<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeBillboard_constant_BILLBOARD_TYPE_FIXED_Y"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[BillboardType](class_visualshadernodebillboard.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeBillboard_BillboardType) **BILLBOARD_TYPE_FIXED_Y** = `2`

A billboarding algorithm to rotate around Y-axis is enabled.<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeBillboard_constant_BILLBOARD_TYPE_PARTICLES"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[BillboardType](class_visualshadernodebillboard.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeBillboard_BillboardType) **BILLBOARD_TYPE_PARTICLES** = `3`

A billboarding algorithm designed to use on particles is enabled.<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeBillboard_constant_BILLBOARD_TYPE_MAX"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[BillboardType](class_visualshadernodebillboard.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeBillboard_BillboardType) **BILLBOARD_TYPE_MAX** = `4`

Represents the size of the [BillboardType](class_visualshadernodebillboard.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeBillboard_BillboardType) enum.<hr class="classref-section-separator">

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeBillboard_property_keep_scale"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **keep_scale** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#class_VisualShaderNodeBillboard_property_keep_scale)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_keep_scale_enabled**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **is_keep_scale_enabled**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the shader will keep the scale set for the mesh. Otherwise, the scale is lost when billboarding.
